about_the_game:
Formed as part of the Global Game Jam 2022, As Above So Below (AASB) began as a vertical gravity-shifting collection/puzzle-game. Continued by a portion of the original team, AASB adapts the original gameplay into a 2d side-scrolling platformer and expands it's cast of characters. Through the use of new and returning abilities, players embark on a perilous quest to re-unite with their lost sister, while struggling to emerge from an expansive world and emotionally-charged story inspired by Greek mythos.

As Above So Below (AASB) is as a gravity-shifting 2d side-scrolling platformer enhanced by fantastical abilities and a unique cast of characters set within an expansive fictional world inspired by Greek mythos.

Localization: English.
